codeSystems.name: PhenotypicModifierValueSet
codeSystems.title: Phenotypic modifier ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) Clinical Modifier terms

codeSystems.name: DiagnosticMarker
codeSystems.title: Diagnostic Marker
codeSystems.description: Codes to indicate clinically relevant bio markers.

codeSystems.name: HistologicalDiagnosis
codeSystems.title: HistologicalDiagnosis
codeSystems.description: Histological diagnosis codes from NCIT.

codeSystems.name: HpoSeverityVS
codeSystems.title: Hpo Severity Value Set
codeSystems.description: The HPO codes for phenotypic feature severity

codeSystems.name: KaryotypicSex
codeSystems.title: Karyotypic sex value set
codeSystems.description: The karyotypic (chromosomal) sex of an individual

codeSystems.name: Onset
codeSystems.title: Onset ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Set of HPO codes that denote the onset of a disease or phenotypic feature. The codes are descendants of Onset (HP:0003674) or from SNOMED_CT (282032007).

codeSystems.name: Taxonomy
codeSystems.title: Taxonomy
codeSystems.description: Taxonomic identifiers of an organism.

codeSystems.name: TumorGrade
codeSystems.title: Tumor Grade
codeSystems.description: Codes to indicate the grade of a tumor.

codeSystems.name: TumorProgression
codeSystems.title: Tumor Progression
codeSystems.description: Codes to indicate if a specimen is from the primary tumor, a metastasis or a recurrence.

codeSystems.name: TumorStage
codeSystems.title: Tumor Stage
codeSystems.description: Codes to represent the stage of a tumor.

codeSystems.name: AcmgPathogenicityClassificationVS
codeSystems.title: ACMG Pathogenicity Classification Value Set
codeSystems.description: Describes the ACMG five-tier pathogenicity classification system (Richards et al., 2015, https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4544753/).

codeSystems.name: GenoOntologyAllelicStateVS
codeSystems.title: GENO Ontology Allelic State Value Set
codeSystems.description: Descendent terms of GENO_0000875

codeSystems.name: InterpretationStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Interpretation Status Value Set
codeSystems.description: Describes the conclusion made about the genomic interpretation.

codeSystems.name: MoleculeContextVS
codeSystems.title: Molecule Context Value Set
codeSystems.description: Describes The molecular context of the variant. Default is unspecified_molecule_context.

codeSystems.name: ObservationCategories
codeSystems.title: Observation categories
codeSystems.description: ValueSet description here

codeSystems.name: PhenotypicAbnormalityValueSet
codeSystems.title: Phenotypic abnormality ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet description here

codeSystems.name: PhenotypicComponentValueSet
codeSystems.title: Phenotypic component ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet description here

codeSystems.name: PhenotypicFeatureStatusValueSet
codeSystems.title: Observation Codes for status of a PhenotypicFeature
codeSystems.description: The LOINC codes for present if a feature is observed and absent if a feature was excluded.

codeSystems.name: SequenceOntologyStructuralVariantVS
codeSystems.title: Sequence Ontology Structural Variant Value Set
codeSystems.description: Descendent terms of SO:0001537.

codeSystems.name: TherapeuticActionabilityVS
codeSystems.title: Therapeutic Actionability Value Set
codeSystems.description: Describes the therapeutic actionability of the variant.
